welcome_message: Discover a world of art at your fingertips. ArtVirtuoso is an online gallery where you can buy and sell artwork, attend events, and explore a wide range of art pieces from talented artists around the world.
events_message: Dive into the world of art with our exclusive events. From gallery openings to artist talks, workshops, and virtual tours, ArtVirtuoso offers a variety of events for art lovers and creators alike. Connect with fellow art enthusiasts and gain insights from industry professionals.
about_us_intro: An exclusive online gallery for buying and selling exquisite artworks. A place where art enthusiasts can connect, explore, and be inspired.
who_we_are_description_1: Founded in 2024, ArtVirtuoso is an online gallery that connects art enthusiasts from around the world. Our platform provides a space for artists to showcase their work and for collectors to discover unique pieces.
who_we_are_description_2: Our team is dedicated to promoting the arts and creating a community where people can buy and sell artwork, attend virtual events, and participate in discussions about the art world.
what_we_offer_description_1: At ArtVirtuoso, you can find a diverse range of artworks including paintings, sculptures, digital art, and more. Our easy-to-use platform ensures a seamless experience for both buyers and sellers.
what_we_offer_description_2: We also host a variety of events such as virtual exhibitions, artist talks, and workshops. These events provide opportunities for learning, networking, and fostering a deeper appreciation for the arts.
our_mission_description_1: Our mission is to make art accessible to everyone and to support artists in their creative endeavors. We believe in the power of art to inspire, educate, and transform communities.
our_mission_description_2: Join us on this journey to explore the beauty and diversity of the art world. Whether you are an artist, a collector, or simply an art lover, ArtVirtuoso is your gateway to a world of creativity.

what_information_to_provide: What information do I need to provide when selling my artwork?
provide_information_description: You need to provide the name of the artwork, artist name, art format, date, price, a description of the artwork, and your contact email. You will also need to upload images of the artwork.
